Package org.jikesrvm.classloader

Provides classes that implement the classloading system as well as data types that represent Java entities like classes, fields, methods and primitives.

See: Description

    Interface Description
    BootstrapClassLoader.Handler<T>  
    ClassLoadingListener
    Interface for callbacks on classloading events.

    BootImageMemberLookupError  

Package org.jikesrvm.classloader Description

Provides classes that implement the classloading system as well as data types that represent Java entities like classes, fields, methods and primitives.

Code in the classloading subsystem must be carefully written not to cause dynamic classloading during the boot of the VM. This means that all necessary classes must be contained in the bootimage.
